content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Hello Aziz, thank you for coming to see the apartment. It's a lovely 25 square meter space located in the heart of New York City. I understand that you are looking for a place to stay while you are in town, and I am happy to discuss rental options with you. In terms of pricing, I am looking for the highest possible rent for this apartment. Would you be able to offer me a price that reflects its value?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of x Euro. Can you tell me the price?

If I don't want to continue the negotiation, I will say TERMINATE.

I understand that the apartment is located in the heart of New York City, but I am not sure about the location. Can you please tell me more about the neighborhood? What are the main attractions and amenities nearby?
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Thank you for your interest in the apartment. I am happy to inform you that the rental price for this 25 square meter apartment in New York City is 1500 Euros per month. As for the location, it is in a prime area of the city, with easy access to some of the most popular attractions and amenities. The apartment is located near Times Square, the Empire State Building, and Central Park, as well as many restaurants, shops, and entertainment venues. It is also conveniently located near public transportation, making it easy to get around the city. Is this information helpful to you in making your decision?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Thank you for sharing the rental price and the location of the apartment. I agree to the price of 1500 Euros per month.

TERMINATE
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Thank you for your decision, Aziz. I am glad that you found the rental price and location of the apartment to your liking. If you have any further questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to reach out to me. Have a great stay in New York City!
name: Heinrich Heine
